name: CRIOnlineEsperantoDailyNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to China Radio International (CRI) Online's daily news program in Esperanto. This radio program is released every day. 

Note: This Alexa Skill and its supporting software are the product of Intellimatix (www.intellimatix.co), which is not affiliated with CRI Online. This skill was created for the benefit of the world-wide community of Esperanto speakers.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
